name: RS Techno Solutions
overview:
RS Techno Solutions specializes in providing a services in software solutions - technology, end-to-end solutions in web Design & Development, Customized Software Development, Business Intelligence and IT Consulting & Outsourcing Advisory Services.

Areas of Specialization

  • Web Design and Development Services (PHP, ASP.NET, ASP, JSP, XML, Flash, Web 2.0).
  • Customized Software Development & Maintenance Services.
  • Business Intelligence Services. (Telecom, Real estate, Banking, Retail, Contact Centres, Export & Import).
  • Offshore Outsourcing & Consulting Services (Technology Outsourcing, Business Process Outsourcing, Supply Chain Operations Outsourcing)

Also expertise in providing the consulting service in Data Warehousing and Business Intelligence solutions area’s, in which data matching, data profiling, data cleaning, data mining, data base administration, data analysis service, reporting service, interactive and intelligence dashboard creation and alaysis services, support & service solutions, providing the end-to-end solutions and support that is one stop solutions, major clients are industries wise, Insurance, Textile, Banking, Real-Estate, Telecommunication Industries, E-commerce industires & contact center solutions I am also into managing the web application development like CMS e-commerce solutions i.e. shopping portal , and customized solutions, like ERP, School/College Management solutions.
